<font size = "6" color = "steelblue">__Goals__</font>

* __To build R programming skills for beginners__ 

<center>

<font size = "6" color = "steelblue">__Objectives__</font>

By the end of this training, you should be able to:

* Master the use of RStudio interactive environment

* Install R packages

* Explore and understand how to use the R documents

* Load data into R from various sources

* Undertand different data types and data structures in R

* Use the tidyverse packages to manipulate data frames

* Understand how to create and manipulate dates in R

* Create plots using ggplot2 

* Write user-defined R functions

* Use control statements

* Write loops

* Use apply family of functions to iterate funtions across data

* Reshape data

* Join tables

* Identify and deal with missing data

* Manipulate strings in R

* Conduct basic data analysis using R
